level.heading: Public toilet rooms.
level.text: ยง 27-292.12 Public toilet rooms.--Where public toilet rooms are provided, there shall be at least one water closet stall and lavatory fixture for each sex which is accessible to and usable by people having physical disabilities and complies with the requirements of paragraph (c) of section P104.1 of reference standard RS 16-1 and reference stadard RS 4-6.
